abstract: Andy Murray defeats Fernando Verdasco in second round of Aegon Championships tennis tournament at Queen's Club in London.
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Andy Murray stayed on course for a fourth title at Queen’s Club in London by defeating Fernando Verdasco, 7-5, 6-4, in the second round.

headline.main: Murray Tops Verdasco at Queen’s Club

snippet: Top-seeded Andy Murray stayed on course for a fourth title at Queen’s Club in London by defeating Fernando Verdasco, 7-5, 6-4, in the second round.
